name: Project Phase Tracker
tagline: A lightweight, offline-first tracker for moving projects cleanly from idea to done.
description: Project Phase Tracker helps you manage multiple projects by moving each one through a simple lifecycle: Idea → Build → Fix → Done. Everything runs locally in your browser—no accounts, no sync, no distractions. Especially useful when you want structure without overhead.
features: Track projects across four phases: Idea, Build, Fix, Done
Inline project inspector for editing owner, due date, and notes without leaving the board
Phase-aware notes so context stays with each stage
Sort and search projects by update time, phase, due date, or creation
Export and import projects as JSON
Fully offline — data stored locally in your browser
for_who: Freelancers managing multiple small to medium projects
Solo builders who want a clear, lightweight overview
Anyone who prefers simple tools over complex project managers
not_for: Projects requiring cloud sync or multi-user access
